collection.body:
Olympics 2012

With the Olympics in town in 2012, I was compelled to produce this series of posters to commemorate the games coming to London. I played with the idea of likening the athletes' abilities to that of animals with legendary abilities in the same area.
collection.summary: With the Olympics in town in 2012, I was compelled to produce this series of posters to commemorate the games coming to London. I played with the idea of likening the athletes' abilities to that of animals with legendary abilities in the same area.
collection.title: Olympics 2012
